page.title: 04Newspapers _ Ingleton Area
page.content: Members of Ingleton Wine Circle enjoyed a slide show at the Community Centre.Ingleton found themselves two goals down in the Senior Challenge, the score was Ingleton 6, Marsh United 3.In the local newspaper each week there are houses for sale, for example Brow Cottage,Main Street, Ingleton; it has 2 bedrooms.It has a gas fire, central heating and modern wiring.It has a large rear garden and garage. The lounge has a stone fireplace, the bathroom has a fitted shower, the price is Â£24,000. Another example is the new bungalow just off the New Village. This threee bedroomed bungalow overlooks the school playing field, it has central heating and double glazed windows. It has an oak kitchen unit. The price is Â£39,950.
